column2: UPDATE 1-Yahoo CEO says Firefox deal will boost search market share SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Nov 19 Yahoo Inc struck a deal with Firefox maker Mozilla Corp to replace Google Inc  as the default search engine on the Firefox Web browser in the United States
column4: a move that Yahoo Chief Executive Marissa Mayer said will help boost its flagging search market share.

column2: Morgan Stanley sees Petrobras scandal write-offs of up to $8.1 billion SAO PAULO Petróleo Brasileiro SA could slash the value of its assets by as much as 21 billion reais ($8.1 billion) and cut dividends as a result of an ongoing investigation into alleged graft and money-laundering at Brazil's state-controlled oil producer
column3: analysts at Morgan Stanley & Co said in a client note.

column2: China Premier says Qualcomm's "opportunities greater than challenges"China Premier says Qualcomm's 'opportunities greater than challenges'Qualcomm CEO more cautious on future revenue growth SAN FRANCISCO Mobile chipmaker Qualcomm Inc on Wednesday gave a more conservative five-year outlook than in the past as it faces an antitrust probe in China and consumers there and in other developing countries buy lower-priced smartphones.  Qualcomm CEO more cautious on future revenue growth SAN FRANCISCO Mobile chipmaker Qualcomm Inc on Wednesday gave a more conservative five-year outlook than in the past as it faces an antitrust probe in China and consumers there and in other developing countries buy lower-priced smartphones. WUZHEN China Qualcomm Inc's  opportunities in China will be far greater than its challenges

column2: UPDATE 1-Yahoo CEO says Firefox deal will boost search market share SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Nov 19 Yahoo Inc struck a deal with Firefox maker Mozilla Corp to replace Google Inc  as the default search engine on the Firefox Web browser in the United States
column4: a move that Yahoo Chief Executive Marissa Mayer said will help boost its flagging search market share.
